entry.title: Atosa ATMG-48 48" Manual Countertop Gas Griddle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Atosa Refrigeration
Type: Griddles
Price: 1496.00

Dimension: 48" Wide X 28-1/2" Deep x 15-1/4" Height(Including 4" legs)
# of Burners: 4 Burners independent manual control
BTU: 30,000 Per Burner/ 120,000 Total 
Plate: 3/4" Polished Steel Thick
Warranty: 1 Year Parts and Labor Warranty

 

Atosa ATMG-48 48" Countertop radiant gas griddle will be a perfect addition to any kitchen to cook up some delicious cuisine. The heavy duty stainless steel constructions prolong usage and easy maintenance. This griddle comes with standard 3/4" polished steel plate which provides added durability for prolong use. The 4" adjustable legs comes standard with every unit. Best of all, this unit offers the best valve and comes with 1 year worry free parts and labor warranty. 
  • The Next Generation of ruggedly constructed gas griddles, charbroilers, fryers, and plates deliver heavy duty performance.
  • Durable stainless steel structure for corrosion-resistant and easy maintenance.
  • Heavy duty burners with stable flame and stand by pilot 
  • Adjustable 4" Legs
  • Quality products at an exceptional value, that help operators of commercial kitchens and restaurants realize better bottom line results.
  • The unit is the most economical and flexible in the food service industry.
  • Intertek ETL Listed and NSF compliant to North American product safety standards and required sanitation standards.

entry.title: Radiance TATG-36 36" Commercial Countertop Thermostatic Gas Griddle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Turbo Air
Type: Griddles
Price: 2609.00

Turbo Air Radiance TATG-36 Commercial Countertop Thermostatic Gas Griddle 36"

  • Stainless steel front, sides and 4” front top ledge
  • 4” backsplash with tapered side splashes
  • One thermostat control for each burner
  • One 22,000 BTU/hr U shaped aluminized burner for every 12” of griddle width
  • Ergonomically designed heat resistant PPS (Poly Phenylene Sulfide) On-Off knob
  • 1” polished steel griddle plate
  • Adjustable standing pilot for each burner
  • High efficiency griddle will provide faster cooking and recovery but use less gas
  • ¾” rear gas connection and gas pressure regulator
  • 2” stainless steel legs included
